title: Ghost Train, The - Radio Drama
description:
1 x 90 mins

Arnold Ridley's classic comedy thriller which, despite being written in the 1920s, has been constantly in production somewhere in the world for the past 90 years.

A disparate group of train passengers - an elderly spinster, a pair of newly-weds, an idiotic young man and others - find themselves stranded on a lonely country station. The station master warns them not to stay the night on the station, telling them of a ghostly train that travels the line. What will they do
